meanings.definition: To teach or provide knowledge or information to someone
meanings.sent1: She is instructing the students on how to solve math problems.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is instructing the class on the importance of recycling.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started instructing the cat on how to meow.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl was instructing the young birds on how to fly gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The chef was instructing his apprentice on the secret recipe for the famous dish.

meanings.definition: To give directions or orders to someone
meanings.sent1: The coach is instructing the players on the game strategy.
meanings.sent2: The sergeant is instructing the soldiers on the mission details.
meanings.sent3: The robot started instructing the vacuum cleaner on how to clean efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The traffic light was instructing the cars to stop and go with its colors.
meanings.sent5: The boss was instructing his employees on the new company policies.
